ygData.subject: Mask of Deception and ultravision
ygData.msgSnippet: Well this is definately strange because it isn t working for me.  I was in Ogguk fighting bouncers near the zone when I activated the illusion.  There isn t a
ygData.messageBody:
Well this is definately strange because it isn't working for me. I was in
Ogguk fighting bouncers near the zone when I activated the illusion. There
isn't a light source there so it became very dark. When I told my party I
couldn't see anymore, the shaman buffed me with Ultravision and I could then
see very well. The ultravision buff from the shaman gave everything a
bluish tint to it so thats how I knew that the DE illusion wasn't working.

The end result is that I hardly ever activate the illusion anymore. Only
reason I do it in Ogguk is so I can sell to the merchant with an amiable
/con.

Galtin of E'ci


> From: Valharick@...
>
> Yep Ive got the new mask and it gives me UV just fine.
>
>
